<title level="1" right="Trait">[Razing](/Traits.aspx?ID=488)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 221 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

Razing weapons are particularly good at damaging objects, structures, and vehicles. Whenever you deal damage to an object (including [shields](/equipment/shields) and [animated objects](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=4)), structure, or vehicle with a razing weapon, the object takes an amount of additional damage equal to double the number of weapon damage dice.
